short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatExt - Best look and feel for Google Chat

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change google chat interface, more friendly and intelligent.
Please give me 5 stars and share it with everyone if you find it useful. 
Contact to me: chatext@outlook.com

Don't hesitate to connect with me if you have any ideas.
"Buy me a coffee if you love this extension." https://buymeacoffee.com/dngteam


“Love to work at Google with the Google Chat development team to create an awesome chat application.”

Release note:
2024.Sep.16: Improved performance and fixed some bugs.
2024.Aug.10: You can organize the order of the folders.
2024.Aug.8: Support some languages
2024.Aug.6: Support CN language.
2024.Jul.27: You can now easily back up and restore your configuration data.
2024.Jul.26: Fix issue related to migrate data.
2024.Jul.25: Fix issue realted to cannot switch to other account, optimize UI.
2024.Jul.15: Fix issue related to cannot add many spaces into folder.
2024.Jun.09: Fix issue related to sometimes the SPACE cannot be moved to a FOLDER.
2024.Mar.25: Fix issue related to user have many spaces.
2024.Mar.23: Bug fixes and performance improvement.
2024.Feb.06: Welcome Tet holiday 2024.
2024.Jan.15: Compatible with Japanese language users has been integrated.
2024.Jan.10: Happy new year #newfeature #Improve UI
*******
2023.Dec.29: Last release 2023.
2023.Dec.28: Apply scroll style.
2023.Dec.27: Improve user experience, fix bugs related to display all spaces.
2023.Dec.26: Fix display on some device.
2023.Dec.25: Support New UI.
2023.Nov.27.2023: Fix Bug.
2023.Oct.31.2023: Fix UI broken
